mapper.select: SELECT id, pwd, name, email, addr, enabled, authority, reg_dt as regDt, reg_tm as regTm, upd_dt as updDt, upd_tm as updTm FROM tb_user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (id, pwd, name, email, addr, reg_dt, reg_tm, upd_dt, upd_tm) value(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{addr}, curdate()+0, curtime()+0, curdate()+0, curtime()+0)
